entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow mixed with rain ending early this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 24 April 2023
